page.title: 05Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre
page.content: {EBBW VALE LEISURE CENTRE A modern building catering for swimming,badminton,squash,weight training,wall climbing,indoor cricket and volleyball. Other facilities include several committee rooms,provision for individual clubs including keep fit, judo,gymnastics,slimming,karate etc. The main hall is used for concerts, dances,public meetings,religious conventions and displays. There is a large pool and a learner pool-used during term time by local schools.Wed.and Thurs.evenings are for various club activities- swimming instruction,sub aqua and life saving. Sauna,sunbed,beauty therapy can be booked in advance.
